Components

Add to Watch List

This is the Add To Watch List component.

Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/add-to-watch-list') }}

<button class="add-to-watch-list button" type="sumit" aria-label="Add movie to my watch list">
  {{ add_text }}
</button>

Button

This is the button component.

.button--primary
A button variation with strong styles.
Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/button') }}

{# If an url value is provided render as a link #}
{% if button.url %}
  <a href="{{ button.url }}" class="button {{ modifier_class }}{{ classes|default('') }}">
    {{ button.text }}
  </a>
{# Otherwise render as a button. #}
{% else %}
  <button
    type="{{ button.type|default('submit') }}"
    class="button {{ modifier_class }}{{ classes|default('') }}">
    {{ button.text }}
  </button
{% endif %}

Card

This is the card component for the project's landing page.

Movie title goes here

Opening this fall
action
pg13
8/10
Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur. Maecenas sed diam eget risus varius blandit sit amet non magna.
Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/card') }}

<article class="card {{ attributes ? attributes.class }}"{{ attributes ? attributes|without(class) }}>
{% if cover_image %}
  <div class="card__cover-image">
    {{ cover_image }}
    <button class="card__icon js-add-to-list" aria-label="Add to watch list">
    </button>
  </div>
 {% endif %}
 {% if heading or average_rating or genre or synopsis or mpaa_rating or promo_sentence %}
  <div class="card__content">
    {% if heading %}
      {{ title_prefix }}
        {%
          include '@nitflex_theme/heading/heading.twig' with {
            "heading": {
              "title": heading.title,
              "url": "#",
              "heading_level": 3,
              "classes": 'card__heading'
            }
          } only
        %}
      {{ title_suffix }}
    {% endif %}
    {% if promo_sentence %}
      <div class="card__promo">
        {{ promo_sentence }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}
      {% if genre %}
      <div class="card__genre">
        {{ genre }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}
    {% if mpaa_rating %}
      <div class="card__mpaa-rating">
        {{ mpaa_rating }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}
    {% if average_rating %}
      <div class="card__average-rating">
        {{ average_rating }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}
    {% if synopsis %}
      <div class="card__synopsis">
        {{ synopsis }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}
  </div>
 {% endif %}
</article>

                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/eyebrow') }}

Featured Movie

This is the featured movie component.

BADCamp 2018

Attend its 11th season this fall

Rated

PG13

6/10

Watch now
Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/featured-movie') }}

<section class="featured-movie {{ attributes ? attributes.class }}"{{ attributes ? attributes|without(class) }}>
  {% if cover_image %}
    <div class="featured-movie__cover-image">
      {{ cover_image }}
    </div>
  {% endif %}
  {% if title or mpaa_rating or average_rating or promo_text or sypnosis %}
    <div class="featured-movie__meta">
      {% if title %}
        <div class="featured-image__title">
          {{ title_prefix }}
            {%
              include '@nitflex_theme/heading/heading.twig' with {
                "heading": {
                  "title": title,
                  "heading_level": 1,
                  "url": ""
                }
              } only
            %}
          {{ title_suffix }}
        </div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if promo_text %}
        <div class="featured-movie__promo">
          {%
            include '@nitflex_theme/eyebrow/eyebrow.twig' with {
              "eyebrow": promo_text
            }
          %}
        </div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if mpaa_rating %}
        <div class="featured-movie__mpaa-rating">
          <span>{{ 'Rated '|t }}</span>
          {%
            include '@nitflex_theme/eyebrow/eyebrow.twig' with {
              "eyebrow": mpaa_rating
            }
          %}
        </div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if average_rating %}
      <div class="featured-movie__average-rating">
        {%
          include '@nitflex_theme/eyebrow/eyebrow.twig' with {
            "eyebrow": average_rating
          }
        %}
      </div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if sypnosis %}
      <div class="featured-movie__synopsis">
        {{ sypnosis }}
      </div>
      {% endif %}
      {% if watch_button or add_button %}
        <div class="featured-movie__ctas">
          {% if watch_button %}
            {%
              include '@nitflex_theme/button/button.twig' with {
                "button": watch_button
              } only
            %}
          {% endif %}
          {% if add_button %}
            {%
              include '@nitflex_theme/button/button.twig' with {
                "button": {
                  "text": add_button.text,
                  "classes": 'button--primary'
                }
              } only
            %}
          {% endif %}
        </div>
      {% endif %}
    </div>
  {% endif %}
</section>

Heading

This is the heading component.

Back to being BAD

Markup Details
                            {{ attach_library('nitflex_theme/heading') }}

{# Default to h2 (heading level 2) if no heading level is supplied. #}
{% set heading_level = heading.heading_level | default(2) %}

<h{{ heading_level }} class="heading">
  {% if heading.url %}
    <a href="{{ heading.url }}">{{ heading.title }}</a>
  {% else %}
    {{ heading.title }}
  {% endif %}
</h{{ heading_level }}>
